API Collection# SIMD Implementations

## [Topics](/documentation/swift/simdmask/simd-implementations#topics)

### [Operators](/documentation/swift/simdmask/simd-implementations#Operators)

[`static func .!= (Self.Scalar, Self) -> SIMDMask<Self.MaskStorage>`](/documentation/swift/simdmask/)Returns a vector mask with the result of a pointwise inequality comparison.[`static func .!= (Self, Self) -> SIMDMask<Self.MaskStorage>`](/documentation/swift/simdmask/)A vector mask with the result of a pointwise inequality comparison.[`static func .!= (Self, Self.Scalar) -> SIMDMask<Self.MaskStorage>`](/documentation/swift/simdmask/)Returns a vector mask with the result of a pointwise inequality comparison.[`static func .== (Self.Scalar, Self) -> SIMDMask<Self.MaskStorage>`](/documentation/swift/simdmask/)Returns a vector mask with the result of a pointwise equality comparison.[`static func .== (Self, Self.Scalar) -> SIMDMask<Self.MaskStorage>`](/documentation/swift/simdmask/)Returns a vector mask with the result of a pointwise equality comparison.[`static func .== (Self, Self) -> SIMDMask<Self.MaskStorage>`](/documentation/swift/simdmask/)A vector mask with the result of a pointwise equality comparison.[`static func == (Self, Self) -> Bool`](/documentation/swift/simdmask/==(_:_:))Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two vectors are equal.### [Initializers](/documentation/swift/simdmask/simd-implementations#Initializers)

[`init<S>(S)`](/documentation/swift/simdmask/init(_:))Creates a vector from the given sequence.[`init(arrayLiteral: Self.Scalar...)`](/documentation/swift/simdmask/init(arrayliteral:))Creates a vector from the specified elements.[`init(from: any Decoder) throws`](/documentation/swift/simdmask/init(from:))Creates a new vector by decoding scalars from the given decoder.[`init(repeating: Self.Scalar)`](/documentation/swift/simdmask/init(repeating:))A vector with the specified value in all lanes.### [Instance Properties](/documentation/swift/simdmask/simd-implementations#Instance-Properties)

[`var description: String`](/documentation/swift/simdmask/description)A textual description of the vector.[`var indices: Range<Int>`](/documentation/swift/simdmask/indices)The valid indices for subscripting the vector.### [Instance Methods](/documentation/swift/simdmask/simd-implementations#Instance-Methods)

[`func encode(to: any Encoder) throws`](/documentation/swift/simdmask/encode(to:))Encodes the scalars of this vector into the given encoder in an unkeyed container.[`func hash(into: inout Hasher)`](/documentation/swift/simdmask/hash(into:))Hashes the elements of the vector using the given hasher.[`func replace(with: Self.Scalar, where: SIMDMask<Self.MaskStorage>)`](/documentation/swift/simdmask/replace(with:where:)-6wonx)Replaces elements of this vector with `other` in the lanes where `mask` is `true`.[`func replace(with: Self, where: SIMDMask<Self.MaskStorage>)`](/documentation/swift/simdmask/replace(with:where:)-7bhx)Replaces elements of this vector with elements of `other` in the lanes where `mask` is `true`.[`func replacing(with: Self, where: SIMDMask<Self.MaskStorage>) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/simdmask/replacing(with:where:)-2gka4)Returns a copy of this vector, with elements replaced by elements of `other` in the lanes where `mask` is `true`.[`func replacing(with: Self.Scalar, where: SIMDMask<Self.MaskStorage>) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/simdmask/replacing(with:where:)-3lyjl)Returns a copy of this vector, with elements `other` in the lanes where `mask` is `true`.
